page.title: 17BOSTON MAYFAIR
page.content: The fair comes to{Boston}each year in} {May.}There are lots of rides such as the Tip Top,Matterhorn,Waltser and Meteorite.There are lots of stalls where you can win prizes like darts, coconut shys and rubber ducks. Years ago they used to have a girl sat in a cage full of rats.She was called the Rat Girl.The Big Horses and the Cakewalk are old rides but they are still very popular.There has been known to be a flea circus at some {fairs.In the Middle Ages the fair used {to be a place of trade.}People would come from miles around to buy and sell things.The King and Queen would take taxes out of the money the fair made.The fair was not just rides it was like a{market too.}You get new rides nearly every year in the fair today.Other well known fairs are Hull Goose fair and Nottingham Goose fair.
